purpose: Enable employees to request company-approved devices (notebooks and phones) through a self-service Power App, triggering approval workflows and integrating with internal policies.

mvp_components.app_details: Allows employees to browse available devices, view specs, photos, availability, and filter by department-approved models.

app_screens.screen_details: View specs, photos, and availability of selected device.

mvp_components.app_details: Allows employees to select a device, justify business need, select urgency level, and auto-populate employee name/department from Azure AD.

app_screens.screen_details: Select a device from the catalog.
Input business need and urgency level.
Auto-populate employee details from Azure AD.

mvp_components.flow_details: Managers receive approval notifications and can approve/reject requests with comments within a 2 business day SLA.

flow_actions.action_details: Manager receives a notification for approval.
Manager approves or rejects the request with comments.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allows employees to view the status of their orders and receive email notifications at each step. Optional Power BI dashboard for tracking.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the Order Request Form with a new screen for tracking to provide a seamless experience within the same app.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allows IT Administrators to update stock levels, mark orders as fulfilled, and link to the procurement system.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the Device Catalog app with new screens for inventory management to centralize device-related functionalities.

constraints: Must use Power Apps Canvas App
Data must be stored in Dataverse
Approval process must use Power Automate
Device models filtered by department policy
App must support desktop + mobile usage
No external users (internal only via Azure AD)
integration_points: Power Automate for approvals and notifications
notes: Design should be clean and corporate with responsive layout for phone and desktop. Use dropdowns, cards, and status icons. Ensure accessible design (WCAG AA).
